attributes.action: admit that politicians aren't as stupid as they look
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With millions of emails being gathered by no 10 of trouble makers, grumblers and other discontents, surely this is just a scam to obtain an email list by which the government will contact us all just before an election?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
